import React,{useContext,useEffect,useState}from'react';import SharedDataContext from'./SharedDataContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SpotifySearch(){const{searchTerm}=useContext(SharedDataContext);const[data,setData]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{if(searchTerm){fetch("/api/spotify-search?q=".concat(encodeURIComponent(searchTerm))).then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setData(data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching data:',error));}},[searchTerm]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pre",{children:JSON.stringify(data,null,2)})});}export default SpotifySearch;
